data.eml:eml: A new species of Togoperla (Plecoptera: Perlidae) from China with a revised key to Togoperla males

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Weihai, Dewalt, Edward (2012): A new species of Togoperla (Plecoptera: Perlidae) from China with a revised key to Togoperla males. Zootaxa 3564: 54-60, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.282959
